str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
Unclean, impure. Impure (lewd) or specially, (demonic).
Wind, breath, spirit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Without water, dry; subst: dry places, desert. Waterless, i.e. Dry.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
Rest, cessation from labor, refreshment. From anapano; intermission; by implication, recreation.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To turn back, return. From hupo and strepho; to turn under, i.e. To return.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
